title: Make Pro subscription free for owner account, $20 for others

requirements.text: Implement backend logic to automatically grant Pro subscription status to the owner's Internet Identity account without payment

quotes: make it free for only my account

acceptanceCriteria: Owner's Internet Identity principal is hardcoded or configured in the backend
When the owner's account queries their profile, hasPro returns true automatically
Owner's account bypasses all payment requirements for Pro features

requirements.text: Ensure all other user accounts require a $20 USD payment to access Pro features

quotes: for other accounts make it cost 20 us dollers

acceptanceCriteria: Non-owner accounts have hasPro set to false by default
Pro features remain locked until payment is completed
Payment amount is exactly $20 USD as configured in Stripe checkout

requirements.text: Update frontend Pro upgrade UI to reflect that the owner has free Pro access automatically

quotes: make it free for only my account

acceptanceCriteria: Owner sees their Pro badge without needing to purchase
Owner can access all Pro features immediately upon login
Pro upgrade buttons and payment flows are hidden or disabled for the owner

requirements.text: Display '$20 to upgrade' messaging in ProFeaturesModal for non-owner accounts
acceptanceCriteria: ProFeaturesModal shows 'Pay $20 to upgrade' text for regular users
Modal displays Pro features list with pricing information

constraints: Do not modify Internet Identity authentication flow
Keep Pro badge UI in Header component unchanged
nonGoals: Multiple pricing tiers or subscription plans
Dynamic pricing based on user segments
